me.kinomoto.kpub

Class Author

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.kinomoto.kpub.Author

  • public class Author
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores author name. And provides static methods to manage authors.
    See Also:
    getAuthors(String), contains(String)
